name: Meddling Kids
description:
Those meddling kids! They're looking for my candy again! I guess I'll have to teach them a lesson and stop their prying! 

Maybe I can use my monster suit to scare em away by getting infront of em! I gotta be weary of the kid with the bat though, he's got guts and a bat!

Controls:

WASD: Move
LMB: Pick and drop Trap
RMB: Set off Trap

Gotta use the JUMPSCARE trap to push them away, the CLOCK to distract them and the SNARE to stop em in their tracks!
